name: ACCT_EB_STMT_HIST
description: This table contains enterprise statement history information.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCEPT_DT
columns.description: Enterprise statement acceptance date.

columns.name: END_BATCH_DT
columns.description: End batch date for the enterprise statement.

columns.name: PRINT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the Statement Print record.

columns.name: IS_DEMAND_STMT_YN
columns.description: Whether the statement was a demand statement.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_CYC_LVL
columns.description: Enterprise guarantor follow up cycle level. This is used for looking up follow up cycle level message to be printed on statement.

columns.name: PREV_BALANCE_AMT
columns.description: Previous non-demand statement balance.

columns.name: PREV_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Previous non-demand statement amount due.

columns.name: NEW_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: New charges since last non-demand statement.

columns.name: NEW_PAYMENTS_AMT
columns.description: New payments since last non-demand statement.

columns.name: NEW_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: New adjustments since last non-demand statement.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: Total charges amount on the statement.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENTS_AMT
columns.description: Total payments amount on the statement.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: Total adjustments amount on the statement.

columns.name: CUR_BALANCE_AMT
columns.description: Current statement balance.

columns.name: CUR_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Current statement amount due

columns.name: PROC_PROF_YN
columns.description: Whether this statement contains balance from billing system Professional Billing. This will be YES if billing system Professional Billing is using enterprise statement in the guarantor's service area.

columns.name: PROC_HOSP_YN
columns.description: Whether this statement contains balance from billing system Hospital Billing. This will be YES if billing system Hospital Billing is using enterprise statement in the guarantor's service area.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: Invoice number for the statement.

columns.name: HB_PREV_BAL_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the previous statement amount due.

columns.name: HB_PREV_DUE_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the hospital portion of the previous statement amount due.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the new charges.

columns.name: HB_NEW_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the new payments.

columns.name: HB_NEW_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the new adjustments.

columns.name: HB_TOT_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the total charges.

columns.name: HB_TOT_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the total payments.

columns.name: HB_TOT_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the total adjustments.

columns.name: HB_CUR_BALANCE_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the current balance.

columns.name: HB_CUR_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Hospital portion of the current amount due.

columns.name: HB_PMTPLAN_TOT_AMT
columns.description: Hospital billing payment plan original balance.

columns.name: HB_PMTPLAN_BAL_AMT
columns.description: Hospital billing payment plan current balance.

columns.name: HB_PMTPLAN_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Hospital billing payment plan current amount due.

columns.name: HB_PRORATION_AMT
columns.description: This is the prorated self-pay balance contributed to the hospital portion of current balance.

columns.name: PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the previous insurance balance that was shown on the statement.

columns.name: CUR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the current insurance balance from the statement.

columns.name: IS_INFO_STMT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the statement is informational. This item is "1" if the statement was informational, and "0" or " if not. A statement is informational if no self-pay balance was due for the guarantor.

columns.name: PB_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the previous insurance balance for professional billing.

columns.name: PB_CUR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the current insurance balance for professional billing.

columns.name: HB_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the previous insurance balance for hospital billing.

columns.name: HB_CUR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the current insurance balance for hospital billing.

columns.name: STMT_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The guarantor self-pay follow-up level for the statement.

columns.name: STMT_DVRY_MTD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores how the statement was delivered.

columns.name: STMT_FST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant the statement was first viewed in MyChart. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: STMT_LST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant the statement was last viewed in MyChart. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: STMT_PAPER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason why the statement was sent via paper.
entries: Paperless Billing is disabled for the service area
Forced to paper because of self-pay follow-up level
Forced to paper because of guarantor rule
Forced to paper because of hospital account rule
Financial Assistance Program Not Allowed In MyChart
Form is not allowed to be displayed in MyChart
Guarantor missing associated patient or MyChart account
Guarantor is not available in MyChart
No access to billing features in MyChart
MyChart tickler could not be sent
Professional billing letter not marked as Sent
Patient is not active on MyChart
Queued for printing based on estimate rule

columns.name: EB_PMT_PLAN_TOT_AMT
columns.description: Enterprise payment plan total. This is the total amount this payment was created to capture.

columns.name: EB_PMT_PLAN_BAL_AMT
columns.description: Enterprise payment plan balance. This is how much remains to be paid for this payment plan.

columns.name: EB_PMT_PLAN_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Enterprise payment plan due. This is how much was due for the next payment under this plan for each line in the history.

columns.name: PB_HELD_AMT
columns.description: Professional billing held amount. This is the amount that is held from the patient statement due to some or all of the charges being with insurance at the time the statement is sent.

columns.name: PB_VOID_TRANS_AMT
columns.description: Professional billing void/transfer amount. This is the amount of the balance that was voided or transferred since the previous statement.

columns.name: STMT_HIST_IS_MYC_NOTIF_YN
columns.description: Stores if the statement/detail bill notification was sent via MyChart.

columns.name: STMT_HX_CNTST_BAL
columns.description: Stores the contested balance on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TOT_SCH_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of all scheduled payments on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_PAY_NOW
columns.description: The pay now amount on the statement. This is the amount due subtracted by the total scheduled payment amount.

columns.name: PB_CUR_DUE_AMT
columns.description: The professional portion of the current statement amount due.

columns.name: PB_CUR_BALANCE_AMT
columns.description: The professional portion of the current statement balance.

columns.name: PB_NEW_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: The total new professional adjustment amount posted since last statement.

columns.name: PB_NEW_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: The total new professional charge amount posted since last statement.

columns.name: PB_NEW_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: The total new professional payment amount posted since last statement.

columns.name: PB_PMTPLAN_BAL_AMT
columns.description: The professional payment plan balance.

columns.name: PB_PMTPLAN_DUE_AMT
columns.description: The professional payment plan amount due.

columns.name: PB_PMTPLAN_TOT_AMT
columns.description: The professional payment plan total amount.

columns.name: PB_PREV_DUE_AMT
columns.description: The previous professional portion statement amount due.

columns.name: PB_TOT_ADJS_AMT
columns.description: The total professional adjustment amount.

columns.name: PB_TOT_CHARGES_AMT
columns.description: The total professional charge amount.

columns.name: PB_TOT_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: The total professional payment amount.
